Package cycling

Class Race

java.lang.Object
cycling.Race
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
class Race extends Object implements Serializable
Race class.
Represents a single race in the cycling competition.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final String
    description
    The race description.
    private final int
    id
    The ID of the Race.
    private final String
    name
    The name of the race.
    private static int
    numberOfRaces
    The number of instances of Race, automatically incremented when the constructor is called.
    Used for allocation of IDs.
    private ArrayList<Stage>
    stages
    The list of stages included in the race.

    Private method to compute the total length of the race, that is, the sum of all the lengths of each stage in the race.

    Removes a stage from the race.
    static void
    resetNoOfRaces()
    Resets the static variable numberOfRaces.
    Used to reset the CyclingPortal so that IDs start from 0 again.

  • Field Details

    • numberOfRaces

      private static int numberOfRaces
      The number of instances of Race, automatically incremented when the constructor is called.
      Used for allocation of IDs.

    • id

      private final int id
      The ID of the Race.

    • name

      private final String name
      The name of the race.

    • description

      private final String description
      The race description.

    • stages

      private ArrayList<Stage> stages
      The list of stages included in the race.

  • Constructor Details

    • Race

      Race(String name, String description)
      Race class constructor. Initialises a new race with a name and description, and automatically assigns an ID using the number of instances of Race.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the race.
      description - The race description.

  • Method Details

    • resetNoOfRaces

      public static void resetNoOfRaces()
      Resets the static variable numberOfRaces.
      Used to reset the CyclingPortal so that IDs start from 0 again.

    • addStage

      public void addStage(Stage stage)
      Adds a stage to the race.
      Parameters:
      stage - A Stage object to add to the race's stages.

    • removeStage

      public void removeStage(Stage stage)
      Removes a stage from the race.
      Parameters:
      stage - The Stage object to remove from the race's stages.

    • getDetails

      public String getDetails()
      Get the details of this particular Race.
      Returns:
      A formatted string containing details about the race ID, name, description, number of stages, and total length.

    • getId

      public int getId()
      Method to return the ID of a race.
      Returns:
      The ID of the race.

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Method to return the name of a race.
      Returns:
      The name of the race.

    • getDesc

      public String getDesc()
      Method to return the description of a race.
      Returns:
      The race description.

    • getNoOfStages

      public int getNoOfStages()
      Method to return the number of stages in a race.
      Returns:
      The number of stages in the race.

    • getStages

      public Stage[] getStages()
      Method to return an array of Stage objects contained in the race.
      Returns:
      An array of every Stage objects in the race.

    • getTotalLength

      private double getTotalLength()
      Private method to compute the total length of the race, that is, the sum of all the lengths of each stage in the race.
      Returns:
      The total length of the race.
